metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7329 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, as the form action on multiple views utilizes $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] insecurely, mishandling any arbitrary input appended to the webroot URL, without any proper filtration, leading to XSS.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7329` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.29.0+dfsg-1ubuntu2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.29.0+dfsg-1ubuntu2+esm1').
